QAs.question: Which sponsorship level requires the highest amount of sponsorship?
How large of logos can Amazon display on the conference banner/kiosk?
QAs.answer: Amazon can display extra-large logos on the conference banner/kiosk.

QAs.question: How large of logos can Alibaba Cloud display on the conference banner/kiosk?
QAs.answer: Alibaba Cloud can display large logos on the conference banner/kiosk.

QAs.answer: Yes, and the student should pay $800.
